attributes.action: Add an equivalent of Gift Aid to the total raised by the Jo Cox GoFundMe page.
attributes.background: The Jo Cox GoFundMe site has had over 33,000 donations in less than a week.  It was set up quickly to support charitable causes supported by Jo Cox.  There isn't a facility for individuals to add Gift Aid.  The Government should match the total amount raised to donate an equivalent to the Gift Aid.

rejection.details:
The Government has today announced that it will be giving £375,000 - the equivalent of GiftAid - to the fund: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/libor-fines-to-be-used-to-support-military-charities-and-royal-voluntary-service
